review: Reliable. Easy to use. Great option when you are a prime user
author: Gary

review: Easily set up and to use.  Plenty of quality content on Amazon Prime.
author: R. Mittenthal "Thumper"

review: So far, it's been awesome!!! Love it! I have access to all sorts of TV shows and movies through the Fire TV Stick.
author: Leanne

review: Love this thing, easy set up. If you are a prime member get it, lots of movies old and new. Wish remote would light up at night, when in use
author: DARIN HUSSEY

review: I'm glued to my TV almost 24hrs. This thing is awesome
author: Magdalena Golabek

review: I was debating between the apple tv and fire tv stick. For the price it's great but I hate that the fire tv stick does not have any FREE options of quality air play. I purchased AirReceiver and it really is awful. The next air play option is $8. Also the tv stick is not compatible with HBO NOW.
author: Meghan Charles
